thread.title: Watch Obama lead chorus of 'Amazing Grace' at Charleston service
thread.title_full: Watch Obama lead chorus of 'Amazing Grace' at Charleston service

author: The Hill staff
title: Watch Obama lead chorus of 'Amazing Grace' at Charleston service
text: Watch Obama lead chorus of 'Amazing Grace' at Charleston service By The Hill staff - 06/26/15 03:35 PM EDT ADVERTISEMENT President Obama led a chorus of "Amazing Grace" on Friday as he delivered a eulogy for Rev. Clementa Pinckney, a friend and political ally who was one of nine people killed by a gunman last week in a Charleston, S.C., church. Obama leads the arena in Amazing Grace. pic.twitter.com/OhyzdopB2J — Sam Tyson (@SamInteractive) June 26, 2015 "Amazing grace, how sweet the sound, that saved a wretch like me; I once was lost, but now I’m found; was blind but now I see." — @POTUS Boehner doles out new punishment The latest intraparty purge has been particularly aggressive. Supreme Court upholds ObamaCare... The 6-3 decision by Chief Justice John Roberts is a huge victory for... Senate advances fast-track trade... The Senate on Tuesday voted to advance President Obama’s trade agenda,... Cliven Bundy will be held... Bundy and his supporters were in an armed standoff with federal officials... How Republicans pulled a fast one... It's the capture-the-flag you never saw coming. Washington whipped into frenzy... A decision could come as early as Monday in the blockbuster case. ObamaCare chief wins GOP raves The HHS secretary is one of President Obama’s most liked appointees.
